name: Mario & Sonic at the Rio 2016 Olympic Games
synopsis: Join Mario, Sonic and their pals to compete in the Olympic Games – with Mii characters, too! Compete in 14 supercharged Olympic Games events and 14 Plus events with a special Mario and Sonic twist Become a member of a prestigious gym in the Road to Rio Story mode Switch your Mii character’s clothes to unleash your individuality and boost different abilities!
